personal_income_tax.exemptions: Various tax deductions and credits available.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 15.5% of gross income (shared between employer and employee).

corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 15% for small businesses with revenue under 10 million EUR.

withholding_taxes.dividends: 12.8% if recipient is a resident company, 25% if recipient is a non-resident.
withholding_taxes.interest: 0% if recipient is a bank, 12.8% if recipient is a resident company, 25% if recipient is a non-resident.

capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt up to 200,000 EUR.
capital_gains_tax.deferred_taxation: Capital gains tax can be deferred if the proceeds are reinvested in certain assets.

property_tax.rate: Based on assessed value of property.
property_tax.exemptions: Primary residence may be eligible for exemptions.

inheritance_tax.rate: Up to 60% on inherited assets, depending on the relationship to the deceased.
inheritance_tax.exemptions: Spouse and direct descendants are exempt up to certain limits.

wealth_tax.rate: 0.5% on net worth above 1.3 million EUR.

digital_nomad_visa.requirements: Must earn a minimum of 60,000 EUR annually and have proof of health insurance.
digital_nomad_visa.tax_benefits: Can claim the "Impatriate Regime" for tax exemptions on foreign income for up to 8 years.

special_economic_zones.name: Lyon Part-Dieu Business District
special_economic_zones.tax_incentives: Reduced property tax and business rates.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.
Avoids double taxation on business income and dividends.

additional_notes.political_risks: Stable political environment with a strong legal system.
additional_notes.economic_stability: Developed economy with low inflation and currency stability.
additional_notes.legal_system: Robust legal system with clear tax laws and regulations.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 29th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
